name: TheHeadElfHotline
0:
”Alexa tell Head Elf that Jane has been nice”
”Alexa tell Head Elf that John has been naughty”
”Alexa tell Head Elf that Joan has been nice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: head elf
des:
"This Christmas you won't need to send a letter to get your messages to Santa, our new Amazon Echo skill lets your talk directly with his head elf any time, day or night. 

For example, say, ""Alexa, tell Head Elf that Charlie has been naughty"" and you'll receive a message back from Santa HQ. 

If you say, ""Alexa, tell Head Elf that Sam has been good."", congratulations may be in store. "
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
